participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: Resilient and expressive, she finds joy in dancing and values her freedom.
participant_1.background: i like to dance. i was born in somalia. i was forced to marry when i was a. my aunt helped me escape when i was of. now i live in the united states.

participant_2.name: Jake
